TopicTitle: [Stock and Mod Showcase] Show off your UNSC or other sci fi universe replicas

Sabre SSTO

Flight instructions:

1. Keep stable until at 40 m/s and click stage

2. You probably have a better idea than I do after shutting down the rato by pressing 2...

Hotkeys:

1. Activate RATO system

2. Deactivate RATO system

Download link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/v1g9afu3d5as4vz/YSS-2000%20RAPIER%20Edition.craft

It's puny compared to my new craft. I just hope my fx 6300 and gtx 760 are up to the task.

A challenger to whackjob and his many inventions. If I can figure out how to get it into orbit.

Here's my version of drop pods. Not as...utilitarian or useful as andrew123's is, but it does match the look a little closer.

EDIT: Strike that, I had not noticed the [stock Craft] tag.

Edited March 6, 2014 by Cranium
I actually put the stock tag just to represent my crafts. I would enjoy seeing your creation. :) :)

Other sci-fi universes? Then take this functional SSTO:

Rune. Remind you of anything?

Boba Fett slave one... I just realized that both of our sstos have something in common. My ssto barely has any aerodynamic surfaces but compensates with four engines instead of two while you made your ssto craft a vtol. I do wonder how I should make the sabre more space oriented. Should I make it unable to land and make a complete overhaul of the wings to make it more aerodynamic for atmospheric operation.

Edited March 6, 2014 by andrew123

Boba Fett slave one... I just realized that both of our sstos have something in common. My ssto barely has any aerodynamic surfaces but compensates with four engines instead of two while you made your ssto craft a vtol.

Yup on both counts. As my materials teacher used to say, "anything flies if you give it a big enough kick in the butt".

Rune. I think I also heard that later in a conversation about the MIG-25 (fastest cold war fighter by far).

I have a lot of planes to fill that description, but my favorite was the mig 31 replica. Not stock but very accurate.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/40501-Mig-31-and-KEPD-350-Taurus-Cruise-Missile

I rather enjoy making the figurative flying brick. I actually made some supermaneuvrable fighters out of them before due to the liquid styrofoam atmosphere of the game... do you enjoy it?

Should I try recreating the banshee? The K drives that comrade jenkins helped created could easily provide the repulsor thrust. (Although sticking my slipspace drive on it could be dangerous... if you know what that is subtly referencing.)

I would like to see some more crafts. Being a mod craft does not exclude it.

Edited March 6, 2014 by andrew123
Star Wars Y-Wing

That is awesome. I also just made my first super ssto with both vtol capability and extremely good handling in the lower atmosphere. The updated unsc sabre. It is finally here.

I have already post this in space lounge but it may have been unnoticed, the USS Palomino from The Black-Hole movie:

It is peacefully orbiting at ~ 1000 km over Kerbin since days.

USS Palomino

and with its launcher

I don't do replicas because I'm rubbish at them but I do usually choose a sci-fi ship and base my crafts general design on it.

SF-23E (Based on X-wing)

SF-1D (Based on Longsword)

Co-21F (Based on Halcyon)

Not sure if this counts but I made a MiB flying saucer replica awhile back.

That Longsword... drools.

Should I try to make a light or heavy carrier. The dilemma is in the armor and the target size.

Edited March 9, 2014 by andrew123

In my first few days of playing KSP I felt compelled to replicate the Liberator from Blake's 7, sans DriveSphere.

She was, as you would imagine, a wibbly-wobbly mess - So hat's off to some of these designs as it's not enough to get the look, it has to be usable too!

From my skunkworks, I roll out to you my newest black project. The versatile sr-72.

It is extremely maneuverable, has a low stall speed, has almost 3000 units of liquid fuel, can be drone operated, has light landing gear with a unique structural design, has low observability features integrated, can communicate over four channels, and is hypersonic capable. SSTO conversion can also occur on demand.

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/3brgapfuersm7hu/Sr-72%20Goldbird.craft

Aesthetic changes have occurred since these photos. All aspects are now improved, and it is much more sleeker for stealth along with capability for mid air re fueling.

Tanker prototype in progress.
